description:
Rear garden
T1	Cypress x 1 In line with your tree report. Suggested works- Fell to ground level by sectional take down.
S1	Stump/s x 1 Grind down stump to approx. 300mm below ground level
Rear garden
T2	Willow x 1 (Salix spp) Suggested works- Reduce all round by approx. 3-4m to suitable growth points using advanced rigging techniques to minimise damage to surrounding trees and shrubs
Rear garden
T3	Bay x 1	(Laurus nobilis) To improve light. Suggested works:	- Reduce 2 limbs over hanging cypress by approx. 2m - Remove dead wood
Rear garden
T4	Pear x 1	(Pyrus communis)	This small tree is in a poor condition with approx. 50% of the crown having died.Suggested works- Fell to ground level
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
